knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: A skin has formed on the milk.
He was wedded already to his books and his parish .
sentences.chinese: 他早已同他的书本和教区结了不解之缘。

sentences.english: When the river is frozen over with two feet of ice?
sentences.chinese: 河里结了两英尺厚的冰还游泳？

sentences.english: The salesperson rang up all my items and the total price came to 1000 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 售货员将全部商品结了账，总额共1000元。

sentences.english: The lake was sheeted with ice.
The windows had frosted over in the night.
sentences.chinese: 窗玻璃上在夜间结了一层冰。

sentences.english: A happy heart and for the entire restaurant guests TAB.
sentences.chinese: 心中一高兴于是为整个酒楼的客人结了账。

sentences.english: In the end, Bao Mian died and the case was closed.
sentences.chinese: 终于，包勉死了，这个案子结了。

sentences.english: If sound seeds result, precautions against contamination must be tightened.
sentences.chinese: 假如结了正常的种子，则防止混杂必须更严。

sentences.english: The cold has frosted the windows.
Rose up in the morning, found that window has a layer of ice.
sentences.chinese: 早晨起来，发现窗子上已经结了一层冰花。

sentences.english: The windows have frosted over and we can't see out.
sentences.chinese: 窗户上结了霜，我们看不见窗外的东西。

sentences.english: That grow long scar, it has already knot scabs.
sentences.chinese: 那道长长的疤，它早已结了痂。

sentences.english: Ice crusted the lake last night.
sentences.chinese: 湖面上昨夜结了一层冰。
